name: bish bash block
description:
a rugby/nfl arcade game basically...

Play against a friend or play in the blocky cup to unlock new kits for your team to play as!

  • 2 Player - requires controller, you and a friend can each pick a team and play against each other!
  • Blocky cup - this is a cup that allows you to unlock new kits for your team to play as
  • Practice - you can practice against an AI to improve.

Controls

supports a keyboard and a controller

If you are playing by yourself you have to play on a keyboard. If you are playing two player you will require a controller so the other person can play.

  • Player 1 (keyboard) - WASD/Arrow keys to move, space to tackle, pick up the ball and kick (if you have the ball)
  • Player 2 (controller) - joystick to move, A or X (depending on your type of controller, should be the bottom most button on the right) to tackle, pick up the ball and kick (if you have the ball)

If you are bored with someone else in your house its perfect to burn some time on!

Enjoy!
